column1: The evidence  of witness Saraswathi  was not found  to  have  had any

contradictions  or  omissions. 
Therefore  the  testimonial  creditworthiness

of the  witness  was  not  the  matter  before  the 
learned  trial  judge  at  the

trial.  When  the  accused  was  called  upon for 
his defence  at the  close  of

the  prosecution  case 
the  accused  made  a  statement  from  the  dock.  He
admitted  his  presence  inside  the  house  where  the  incident  took  place  on
